// Pivot 0, 0
int road[32] = {
	1492, 20,
	16, 24,
	20, 2976,
	1480, 2975,
	1484, 2484,
	1520, 2485,
	1522, 2980,
	2977, 2977,
	2976, 1523,
	1523, 1520,
	1523, 1480,
	2976, 1480,
	2976, 26,
	2026, 26,
	2020, 520,
	1473, 523
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float road[32] = {
	0.497333f, 0.006667f,
	0.005333f, 0.008000f,
